RiskFactors.Question: Is the customer/UBO/Directors/Controllers Politically Exposed persons?
Customer (including individuals) background check shows adverse media
Is the adverse media material?
Identified and verified the customer, directors and beneficial owner(s)
Has the customer been cooperative during the account opening process
Did a director/partner submit and manage the application process?
Incorporation Date
Is this an existing client? If yes, enter how long the relationship has existed, in years
Describe the corporate structure of the customer. Is it unusual or excessively complex?
Is the customer a company that has nominee shareholders or shares in bearer form
Is the customer listed on any public stock exchange or is it a public body?
If the customer subject to MLR regulations - have AML Policies & Procedures been reviewed & acceptable? (select NA if not subject to MLR)
If the customer subject to MLR regulations - do they have an MLRO Appointed? (select NA if  not subject to MLR)

Answers.Value: No they do not have an MLRO

RiskFactors.Question: Main business activities e.g. Crypto, Adult, MSB, Financial Services
Does the business have a valid and verifiable website that accurately details their business?
Are innovative/ new products/ services evident in business?
Does the customer deal with high-risk sectors, jurisdictions or businesses
Source of funds provided (where required)
Source of wealth provided (where required)
Have we met with this client face to face?
Was the customer introduced by a third party?
Anonymity requested, involved in transactions or feature of the product
Will the customer have access to cash deposits/loads and if so what is the monthly limit?
Will the customer have access to cash withdrawals and if so what is the monthly limit?
Geographical location of customer (if more than one select most prominent or relevant)
Customer Country of Incorporation
Country of main controllers or the board-this will be the location of the directors or other significant controllers or UBO
Does the customer have multiple office locations in more than one country?
Does the customer have other accounts in multiple countries?
Links to High risk countries (e.g corruption; countries subject to sanctions, embargos, or similar measures)
Is there an expectation (or evidence) of high volume or value of international transactions to/from high risk locations
Evidence of operating in or working with Countries with no/little AML regulations�(FATF)
Evidence of operating in or working with Countries providing funding or support for terrorism
If they will group funds: will MSB plausibly be able to (or have they) provide(d) counterparty details and values per payment?
Has the customer received fraud claims against them? (select NA if no information - review CRA must select yes/no)
Complex or inconsistent transaction activity (select NA if no information - review CRA must select yes/no)
High volume of transactions (select NA if no information - review CRA must select yes/no)
High value transactions (select NA if no information - review CRA must select yes/no)
Accepting high charges and/or penalties
High proportion of cash transactions (actual or anticipated)
Does customer intend/expect to make and receive international payments
Is initial investment coming from a recognised financial/credit institution?
Customer will provide Source of Funds for underlying customers where required
